channel.title: Discourse Invented Spaghetti Forums!
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [Which links between ActivityPub and Solid project?](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/which-links-between-activitypub-and-solid-project/529/10):
Hey @rishabh, @Falco: we have more and more the case that discussions spread across Discourse instances, it would be _very nice(TM)_ to have something that helps us federate those topics over ActivityPub. I've seen that ActivityPub support is not on the menu for the upcoming version 2.5 that just started. Do you have any plans moving forward? Do you need help?

item.title: Discourse Invented Spaghetti Forums!
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
We’re moving this discussion to Shaping Up a Business Use-Case for ActivityPub in Discourse

Read full topic
